title: Avoidable: Supreme Court Collegium to Allahabad HC judge on his remarks against Muslims
selftext: 'Avoidable' seriously? That's the best you could come up with?
comments:
Supreme loude ka verdict: avoidable.

Ye loude merit se judge bante hain ðŸ˜‚

This man said the most vile things imaginable and then doesn't even get a slap on the wrist. The venom he spewed in public might be similar to the living room conversations of the collegium.



The Supreme Court is setting precedents which break the very foundation of the Constitution.
Zyada bolenge toh khudki naukri danger mein aajayegi
Meeting Notes: These speeches should be "avoided" till the retirement. It should quietly reflect in your judgement and then all credit should be taken after retirement.

I remember there was a pic of former CJI Bobde sitting on a bike owned by BJP MLA, when someone shared that pic it was considered contempt of court as it showed Judge in bad light.

Here Judge is openly spewing hate .. but its just 'avoidable'

These same people are super quick to bring contempt charges on anyone criticizing them on the basis that critical comments take away trust from the judiciary

Can anyone tell me how this guy can make unbiased decisions in the high court?
Bhool rahe ho kya SC judges are busy planning home functions and calling Mr. PM for occasions with Nixon camera everywhere.
He has a good chance of becoming CJI one day.
This L @ uda should be impeached. But ....
